name: Spinner Album - Sticker Book
description:
Do you like Spinners? So this game is for you! Every day you get 3 free packets for you to earn new Spinner stickers to stick to your album or exchange with friends.

• PLAY WITH FRIENDS •
In Spinner Album you can exchange repeated stickers with friends and also ask for those stickers you don’t have. Play now and invite your friends to help you to collect all the stickers as fast as possible!

• A LOT OF SITCKERS •
Playing Spinner Album you will find several stickers, colored spinners, geometric spinners, modern spinners, fast spinners and more! There are more than 25 pages of stickers to stick. Do not waste more time, download now to quickly complete your album.

• FEATURES •
- 100+ spinners
- 25 pages of stickers
- Rare stickers
- 3 packets of stickers each day
- Exchange stickers with friends
- Exchange stickers for extra packets
- Play with friends

Can you complete your album? Download it now and do it with your friends!
